articles.title: NRL 2020: North Queensland Cowboys, Newcastle Knights, match preview, round seven, team lists and news - NRL.COM
articles.description: North Queensland have a big point to prove after they conceded 34 first-half points in last week's loss to the Wests Tigers.
articles.content:
North Queensland won't have any shortage of motivation to improve after they conceded 34 first-half points in last week's loss to the Wests Tigers.
